member.name: T:Converter.CLI
member.summary: Command Line Interface for Converter app.

member.name: M:Converter.Converter.LineBasedToXML(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Convert LineBased stored information containing people and their families contact information to XML.

member.name: M:Converter.Converter.LoadLineBased(System.String)
member.summary: Load from LineBased frile into Person() object structure.

member.name: T:Converter.Person
member.summary: Person Class used as middle ground for converting between stored data types. Currently LineBased to XML.

member.name: M:Converter.Person.AddNames(System.String[])
member.summary: Add first- and surname member variables.

member.name: M:Converter.Person.AddPhone(System.String[],System.Int32)
member.summary: Add phone numbers to Person or related family member object.
member.param: Mobile and Home numbers as array[2]
Optional: If given, indexes of 0 or higher adds phone numbers to indexed family member

member.name: M:Converter.Person.AddAddress(System.String[],System.Int32)
member.summary: Add address to Person or related family member object.
member.param: Street, City, and Zip, as array[3]
Optional: If given, indexes of 0 or higher adds address information to indexed family member

member.name: M:Converter.Person.AddFamilyMember(System.String[])
member.summary: Create a family member object associated with this person.
member.param: Name and birth year, as array[2]

member.name: M:Converter.Person.ToXML
member.summary: Generate XML structure from Person()-object including family member info.
